definition: to be born/(fig.) to develop out of sth else (of ideas, stories, political systems etc)/(fig.) to shed one's body (to be reborn)/bodiless (e.g. lacquerware)
to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)

sentences.english: Decorate to burnish from model lines, had had the change of thoroughly remould oneself.
sentences.chinese: 从造型线条到打磨装饰，已经有了脱胎换骨的变化。

sentences.english: His idea ofalienation was derived mostly from Hegel.
sentences.chinese: 他的关于异化的理念绝大部分脱胎于黑格尔。

sentences.english: I wonder how the bodiless silk Buddha is made?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道脱胎丝绸佛是怎么做的？

sentences.english: It's like being reborn from the inside out.
sentences.chinese: 它就像是从内到外脱胎换骨一样。

sentences.english: A year after the show was filmed, he is a very different young man.
sentences.chinese: 节目录制一年之后，他完全脱胎换骨。

sentences.english: And I did. Today our whole business is different.
sentences.chinese: 现在我已确实作到，整个公司也仿佛脱胎换骨。

sentences.english: Well, what's special about bodiless lacquerware?
sentences.chinese: 脱胎漆器有什么特别吗？

sentences.english: How to analyze—and create—artworks made out of other artworks.
sentences.chinese: 怎样分析并创造脱胎于其它艺术品掂煺术品。

sentences.english: Besides bodiless lacquerware, we also deal in wooden-bodied lacquerware, madam.
sentences.chinese: 除了脱胎漆器，我们还经营木胎漆器，夫人。

sentences.english: Chui Ball Tong emerge from the womb of underground original music circle.
sentences.chinese: 脱胎于地下音乐节的年轻摇滚力量。

sentences.english: It is no longer hard to continue, as you realise that health foods are making you so much better.
sentences.chinese: 它不再继续努力，你知道你的健康食品正在脱胎换骨。

sentences.english: Theatre will be reinvented and become much freer and more imaginative.
sentences.chinese: 戏剧将脱胎换骨，变得更为自由，更富想象力。

sentences.english: The movement of the body releases a poem and then confirms its rhythmic identity.
sentences.chinese: 身体的律动脱胎出诗歌，并且捋顺他的节奏。

sentences.english: One way or another, Kevin Martin pledges to be unrecognizable.
sentences.chinese: 不成功便成仁，凯文马丁誓言要脱胎换骨。

definition: to evolve (of ideas, designs, constructions etc)/to develop and change
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome
to create/to come up with (an idea etc)
